newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ayala unit merges with CityTrust broking arm.
newsitem.headline: Ayala unit merges with CityTrust broking arm.

text.p: Ayala Bain Insurance Brokers Inc, a unit of Ayala Corporation, said on Monday it had agreed to merge with CityTrust Insurance Brokers Corp (CIBC).
Ayala Bain is a joint venture between Ayala Corporation and U.S.-based AON Corporation.
"Once the proposed combination is approved and effected, Ayala Bain will be co-owned equally by Ayala Corp, AON Corporation and CIBC," Ayala told the Philippine Stock Exchange.
Ayala, through its subsidiary Bank of the Philippine Islands, recently bought into CityTrust Banking Corp, the parent of CityTrust Insurance Brokers Corp.
"Based on known brokerage figures, the expanded operation of Ayala Bain will make it the Philippines' largest broking group," it added.
